name: 楊勝明
objective:
此課程包含以下主題：(1) 直流馬達、伺服馬達、及永磁交流馬達的建模、控制系統設計與模擬，(2) 馬達速度及位置觀測器設計與模擬，(3) 數位控制及驅動器設計與模擬。
The contents of this course include: (1) Modeling, control system design, and simulation of DC motor, servo motor and permanent magnet synchronous motor. (2) Motor speed and position estimator design and simulation. (3) Digital control and driver design and simulation.
schedule:
1. Introduction of Matlab/Simulink, DC Motor model, current control (lab1)
2. DC motor position and velocity control (lab2)
3. PMSM model and V/H control (lab3)
4. PMSM current, velocity, and position control (lab4)
5. Digital control (lab5)
6. Control with velocity estimator (lab6)
7. Control system with resonant load (lab7)
8. Suppress of resonant load (lab8)
9. Mid-term exam.
11. DC-AC Inverter (SPWM) (lab9)
12. Various PWM schemes (lab10)
13. Sensorless vector control with stator flux estimator (lab11)
14. Direct torque control with PWM (lab12)
15. Conventional direct torque control (lab13)
16. Position and velocity estimation with extended back-EMF (lab14)
17. Sensorless position control with extended back-EMF (lab15)
18. Final exam.
materials:
Class notes will be posted in 北科 i 學園.

References:
1. 永磁同步電動機之原理與應用 class note, 2021
2. Control System Design Guide, 3th Editions, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press.
3.Observers in Control Systems, George Ellis, Elsevier-Academic Press, 2010.
4. 控制系統設計與模擬 - 使用 Matlab/Simulink, 李宜達，全華圖書，2011.
